I said the Shiv Sena worker thing as an obvious joke, but I see that you actually do belong to that cadre of people. The ones who just can't let others enjoy what they want in peace. You probably despise homosexuality too?
People like us won't let it work. India is not a western country.
Who are you to 'not let it work'? No one's forcing you to watch the content. No one is about to convert India to the ways of the roast and infect them with the satanic western sense of humour, don't worry man.
That's really rich, coming from a guy surfing reddit.. Very Indian of you.
-patriot nod-

Sigh. Dude do you actually want people to just think up entire genres of comedy or something? I'm not sure of what you're after. "Old western ideas of comedy" contains basically all forms of comedy performed on stage or in the media, be it stand up, sketches, whatever. What do you mean by originality? Can you give me an example of a comic/group you consider original? The roast was a phenomenal success. It was the first of its kind done in India, a country quickly losing all its sense of humour especially when it comes to celebrities who we lift up to god status for some reason. In fact we need more of these. And no it didn't backfire. It's a shame that something not even on TV, that no one is being forced to watch at all has to be removed because of the backwards sense of humour of a country steeped in a Victorian mindset.
I have no idea of what you want. Yeah, AIB is a manifestation of a sense of humour that is largely western in nature. It caters to that audience almost exclusively, the upper middle class/upper class people who like that. No one is being forced to watch it. In its niche, it's creative and funny as hell. In a country where the show most people like is Kapil Sharma/Comedy Circus and whatever, that's a huge achievement, and AIB is skyrocketing in popularity.
If you're so against the implementation of shit that was done in the West first, you'll have to go after stand up, roasts, comic hunts as seen on TV, sketches, all parody movies/videos and every comedy movie. So good luck with that. All we'll have left to cater to you will be a bunch of Kumar Vishwas-es at kavi sammelans.
You, sir, strike me as nothing more than a desi hipster, going after what's popular with almost no reasoning at all.

I'm Indian and boy does reddit hate India. There are only a few subs where an India related post will not deteriorate into just pure stereotype mashing.

Yeah, if you're living in a slum. If you live in even a lower class apartment/house you have access to free treated drinking water through the plumbing. People do shit out in the open in the majority of villages and the slums in the cities but you can just avoid those areas.

Wait why would you expect India to give a shit about Hitler? It was a world away from the holocaust. The people have nothing to do with it. Every country/culture has its own tragedies and sensibilities, it's irrational to expect others to follow yours.

Thousands of feet high pristine mountains, dense jungles with tigers and leopards and lions and elephants, thousands of years of historical landmarks, so much to see, so many different experiences to be had.

Is your laptop/PC very weak? Mine is and I get the same problem, except there shouldn't be a big difference between how a mix sounds through ASIO or the primary driver. It is my understanding, however, that you should trust ASIO over your driver as it bypasses any modifications the OS does to the sound. So use ASIO and mix using it.
